CharaViewer [ZiT]
04201770 60000000
042017D4 60000000
285CE602 00006000
04579D4C BFC00000
CC000000 00000000
04579D4C 3FC00000
E0000000 80008000
1. Enters CharaViewer.
2. Z and C Button is Pushed.
3. Position is Adjusted by Camera Zoom.
4. Position is Adjusted with Up or Down Button.

Universal Codes for Xenoblade Chronicles

Master Button Activator [Thomas83Lin]
F6000001 80008100
80030000 70C99FFF
D2000000 00000003
3D208000 90093200
91093204 80030000
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Needs to be on for the change shop Item*
*Stores Wiimote Status at 80003200*
*Stores Classic Status at 80003204*

Change Shop Item v.5 (Wiimote) [Thomas83Lin]
F6000002 80008100
7C7B1B78 7FA3EB78
5764043E 57C5063E
D2000000 00000013
2C000000 4082008C
48000009 00000000
7CA802A6 A0850002
3F608000 637B3200
A37B0002 2C1B1008
40820014 3884FFE2
2C040000 40810050
48000050 2C1B1004
40820014 3884001E
2C040EA3 4081003C
48000018 2C1B4004
40820018 38840001
2C040EA3 40810024
38800001 4800001C
2C1B4008 4082001C
3884FFFF 2C040000
40820008 38800EA3
B09F0000 B0850002
7C7B1B78 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Requires Master Button Activator*
*Wiimote&NunChuck*
*Hold C hit D-Pad Down to Increase or D-Pad UP to Decrease Item by 1*
*Hold Minus hit D-Pad Down to Increase or D-Pad UP to Decrease Item by 30*
*Credits to 2ch for the Original Ram address*
